mapper.select: select * from user a join profile b on a.no = b.user_no where a.id = #{id} and a.password = password(#{password})
select count(*) as counted from user where id = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into user values(null, #{id}, password(#{password}), #{phone}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, now());
insert into profile values(null, '/gitbook/assets/img/users/1.jpg', #{name}, 'No profile introduction', (select no from user where id = #{id} and and password = password(#{password})))
